item.title: Parents and children rally outside of Wilkinson Elementary as the school board announces possible closure
item.description: School board members said they’re considering closing Wilkinson because it is 50% below utilization.

item.title: Florida leaders react to Charlie Kirk’s death as FBI manhunt for shooter still underway
item.description: An FBI manhunt is underway as officials search for the gunman in what Utah Gov. Spencer Cox called a “political assassination.”

item.title: 24 years later: Sarasota journalist remembers Bush learning of 9/11 at Booker Elementary
item.description: Carson remembers the words vividly. Bush declared, “Our country is under attack.”

item.title: Anna Maria may permanently ban swimming at Bean Point
item.description: The proposed ordinance would prohibit swimming from Fern Avenue to 831 North Shore Drive.

item.title: Florida leaders condemn political violence after the assassination of Charlie Kirk
item.description: Kirk’s killing is just the latest politically targeted act of violence in recent years, including two assassination attempts on President Donald Trump last year.

item.description: This tradition has been going on every year since 2001.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s shooting death exposes security gaps at political events
item.description: Security experts are questioning the protection provided to Charlie Kirk at the Utah college where he was fatally shot.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s casket to be flown from Utah to Arizona aboard Air Force Two Thursday
item.description: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk’s casket to be flown from Utah to Arizona aboard Air Force Two Thursday, AP source says.
